history.narrative: Law 17-230, the “Spam Deterrence Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-34, which was referred to the Committee of Public Service and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 3, 2008, and July 1, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 17, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-450 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-230 became effective on September 11, 2008.
